item.title: The winners of the 2015 iPhone Photography Awards
item.trailText: Have iPhones dumbed down or democratised photography?
item.standFirst: Have iPhones dumbed down or democratised photography? You decide after viewing some of the winning entries from this years competition

displayImages.caption: Michal Koralewski from Kozieglowy, Poland, won photographer of the year with this image of an accordionist in a square in Warsaw.
displayImages.altText: Michal Koralewski from Kozieglowy, Poland, won photographer of the year with this image of an accordionist in a square in Warsaw.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Michal Koralewski from Kozieglowy, Poland, won photographer of the year with this image of an accordionist in a square in Warsaw.

displayImages.caption: David Craik from Surrey, United Kingdom took second place capturing birds eating crumbs from a cafe table.
displayImages.altText: David Craik from Surrey, United Kingdom took second place capturing birds eating crumbs from a cafe table.
displayImages.cleanCaption: David Craik from Surrey, United Kingdom took second place capturing birds eating crumbs from a cafe table.

displayImages.caption: Yvonne Lu from New York, United States placed third with this portrait of travellers on a train along the Hudson Valley.
displayImages.altText: Yvonne Lu from New York, United States placed third with this portrait of travellers on a train along the Hudson Valley.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Yvonne Lu from New York, United States placed third with this portrait of travellers on a train along the Hudson Valley.

displayImages.caption: Jesse Alkire from Chicago, United States was placed first in the news/events category for this shot of planes looping at the Chicago Air and Water Show.
displayImages.altText: Jesse Alkire from Chicago, United States was placed first in the news/events category for this shot of planes looping at the Chicago Air and Water Show.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Jesse Alkire from Chicago, United States was placed first in the news/events category for this shot of planes looping at the Chicago Air and Water Show.

displayImages.caption: Jeremy Kern of Washington DC, United States was awarded first place in the children category, for this picture of children at a school in Haiti.
displayImages.altText: Jeremy Kern of Washington DC, United States was awarded first place in the children category, for this picture of children at a school in Haiti.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Jeremy Kern of Washington DC, United States was awarded first place in the children category, for this picture of children at a school in Haiti.

displayImages.caption: Ahmed Saeed of Cairo, Eypt was placed first in the travel section with his vibrant image of the Nubian village of Gharb Sehal at Aswan.
displayImages.altText: Ahmed Saeed of Cairo, Eypt was placed first in the travel section with his vibrant image of the Nubian village of Gharb Sehal at Aswan.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Ahmed Saeed of Cairo, Eypt was placed first in the travel section with his vibrant image of the Nubian village of Gharb Sehal at Aswan.

displayImages.caption: Mandy Blake from Kitchener, Canada photographed her daughter clambering out of a lake and won second prize in the lifestyle section.
displayImages.altText: Mandy Blake from Kitchener, Canada photographed her daughter clambering out of a lake and won second prize in the lifestyle section
displayImages.cleanCaption: Mandy Blake from Kitchener, Canada photographed her daughter clambering out of a lake and won second prize in the lifestyle section.

displayImages.caption: Ruiridh McGlynn of Edinburgh, United Kingdom, took this picture of a wind blasted tree in the desert in Qatar near the Saudi Arabian border and was awarded first place in the tree section.
displayImages.altText: Ruiridh McGlynn of Edinburgh, United Kingdom, took this picture of a wind blasted tree in the desert in Qatar near the Saudi Arabian border and was awarded first place in the tree section.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Ruiridh McGlynn of Edinburgh, United Kingdom, took this picture of a wind blasted tree in the desert in Qatar near the Saudi Arabian border and was awarded first place in the tree section.

displayImages.caption: Yeankai Lau of Johor, Malaysia, photographed a squid in flour to take third place in the food category.
displayImages.altText: Yeankai Lau of Johor, Malaysia, photographed a squid in flour to take third place in the food category.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Yeankai Lau of Johor, Malaysia, photographed a squid in flour to take third place in the food category.

displayImages.caption: Amy Paterson of Cape Town, South Africa, won first place in flowers with this picture taken at the Silvermine Nature Reserve after fires ravaged her home town in March.
displayImages.altText: Amy Paterson of Cape Town, South Africa, won first place in flowers with this picture taken at the Silvermine Nature Reserve after fires ravaged her home town in March.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Amy Paterson of Cape Town, South Africa, won first place in flowers with this picture taken at the Silvermine Nature Reserve after fires ravaged her home town in March.

displayImages.caption: Alexander Vu from Walnut, California, United States photographed Bob, who was painting a dormitory at an orphanage in Haiti and placed second in portraits.
displayImages.altText: Alexander Vu from Walnut, California, United States photographed Bob, who was painting a dormitory at an orphanage in Haiti and placed second in portraits.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Alexander Vu from Walnut, California, United States photographed Bob, who was painting a dormitory at an orphanage in Haiti and placed second in portraits.

displayImages.caption: Heather Goss of Granf Haven, United States took first place in seasons with her image of the pier at an iced-over Lake Michigan.
displayImages.altText: Heather Goss of Granf Haven, United States took first place in seasons with her image of the pier at an iced-over Lake Michigan.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Heather Goss of Granf Haven, United States took first place in seasons with her image of the pier at an iced-over Lake Michigan.

displayImages.caption: Renai Roberts from Colbee, Australia was awarded third place in the animals category with this shot of a peacock.
displayImages.altText: Renai Roberts from Colbee, Australia was awarded third place in the animals category with this shot of a peacock.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Renai Roberts from Colbee, Australia was awarded third place in the animals category with this shot of a peacock.

displayImages.caption: Robert Radesic of Pula, Croatia captured the Italian town of Trieste as the sun went down and won first place in the sunset section.
displayImages.altText: Robert Radesic of Pula, Croatia captured the Italian town of Trieste as the sun went down and won first place in the sunset section.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Robert Radesic of Pula, Croatia captured the Italian town of Trieste as the sun went down and won first place in the sunset section.
